name: Skin Bat
description: The Skin Bat is a small undead creature with exceptional agility and malevolent instincts. Its ability to navigate in darkness is enhanced by its echolocation and blindsight.
memorable: Its ability to paralyze foes and summon other bats makes it a unique threat in battle.
goals: To incapacitate foes and gather aid from other bats during combat.
relations: Often associated with other undead or bat-like creatures.
environment: Commonly found in dimly lit areas, such as caves or ruins, particularly at night.
strengths: High Dexterity and immunity to poison make it a dangerous foe.
weaknesses: Low Constitution and limited control over its language reduce strategic capabilities.
attacks: Bite attack that inflicts piercing damage and can paralyze the target temporarily.
most_powerful_ability: Echolocation allows it to sense its environment, but it is nullified if deafened.
senses: Has blindsight up to 20 feet, allowing it to detect its surroundings effectively in darkness.
skills: Possesses a Perception skill of +3, enhancing its ability to detect threats.
additional_information: Does not require air or sleep due to its undead nature.
Can attract additional bats for assistance when in danger.
Hindered during deafness, affecting its echolocation ability.
test_queries: agile bat monster that can paralyze
undead bat that summons allies in danger
creature that attacks with a bite and paralysis
flying creature found in dark lit areas
